CmdLine: mkdir /var/lib/resolvconf     && touch /var/lib/resolvconf/linkified     && apt-get update     && apt-get install -y ubuntu-minimal openssh-server     && apt-get clean     && sed -i 's/UsePAM yes/UsePAM no/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: useradd -ms /bin/bash vagrant     && echo -n 'vagrant:vagrant' | chpasswd     && mkdir /home/vagrant/.ssh     && echo 'ssh-rsa  vagrant insecure public key' > /home/vagrant/.ssh/authorized_keys     && chown -R vagrant:vagrant /home/vagrant/.ssh     && echo 'vagrant ALL = NOPASSWD: ALL' > /etc/sudoers.d/vagrant     && chmod 440 /etc/sudoers.d/vagrant
Commands.Name: run
